Details.Caveat: When operated in FIPS mode with modules Windows OS Loader validated to FIPS 140-2 under Cert. #3090 operating in FIPS mode or Windows Resume validated to FIPS 140-2 under Cert. #3091 operating in FIPS mode
Details.Description: Kernel Mode Cryptographic Primitives Library (cng.sys) runs as a kernel mode export driver, and provides cryptographic services, through their documented interfaces, to Windows kernel components. It supports several cryptographic algorithms accessible via a FIPS function table request IRP (I/O request packet).
